meanings.definition: Of superior quality or size; luxurious.
meanings.sent1: The superdeluxe car was shiny and new.
meanings.sent2: She stayed in a superdeluxe hotel during her vacation.
meanings.sent3: The superdeluxe cake was so fancy, it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as superdeluxe as a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The superdeluxe yacht sailed gracefully on the sparkling sea.

meanings.definition: A superior or deluxe version of something.
meanings.sent1: He bought the superdeluxe edition of the video game.
meanings.sent2: The superdeluxe model of the phone had extra features.
meanings.sent3: The superdeluxe ice cream sundae was piled high with toppings.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was a superdeluxe version of the one she wore last year.
meanings.sent5: The superdeluxe package included exclusive access to the event.
